reviewText: Great documentary but it's kind of old fashion.
This was not remotely what had expected. Very boring production. Yes, the story's are true and accurate but the way it was laid out was how to put anyone to sleep. And fast...

I got this as a Christmas gift because my girlfriend knows I like these kinda things. Not half bad. Decent stories but some are slow paced. Video quality is standard definition at 4x3 ratio. Just as it aired. You can get this pretty cheap used. Worth a look.
if you like things that make your spine tingle you'll like these kinds of movies
I would think that anything the History channel produces would at the very least be interesting. And yet, this series was incredibly dull and drawn out. In a word? BORING.
I find the documentary very interesting. I'm really into scary stories and horror films. And I love history.
Truly awesome dvd box set on the paranormal. I would recommend this item to anyone interested in this subject, and/or as a companion piece to Haunted Histories, Volume 1.
